info.title: Erzya speller
info.description: Erzya speller, based on HFST and Divvun/Giellatekno resources. The source code can be found at: https://gtsvn.uit.no/langtech/trunk/langs/myv/ License: GPL3+.

acceptor.title: Fullscale Erzya morphological lexicon
acceptor.description: Complete Erzya dictionary, with no morphological restrictions.

errmodel.title: Levenstein 2 transducer
errmodel.description: Correction model for keyboard misstrokes, at most 2 per word.
